derivation: or (shortened) זְרֹעַ; and (feminine) זְרוֹעָה; or זְרֹעָה; from H2232 (זָרַע);
outline:
1. arm, forearm, shoulder, strength
    1. arm
    2. arm (as symbol of strength)
    3. forces (political and military)
    4. shoulder (of animal sacrificed)
kjv_def: arm, [phrase] help, mighty, power, shoulder, strength.
strongs_def: the arm (as stretched out), or (of animals) the foreleg; figuratively, force
